me.about: I'm a [Research Scientist](https://medicine.yale.edu/profile/huan-he/) working at the [Department of Biomedical Informatics and Data Science](https://medicine.yale.edu/biomedical-informatics-data-science/) of [Yale University School of Medicine](https://medicine.yale.edu/), working with [Dr. Hua Xu](https://medicine.yale.edu/profile/hua-xu/). I was a research fellow in the [Department of AI and Informatics](https://www.mayo.edu/research/departments-divisions/artificial-intelligence-informatics/overview) of Mayo Clinic, working with [Dr. Hongfang Liu](https://www.mayo.edu/research/faculty/liu-hongfang-ph-d/bio-00055092). I received my Ph.D at the [School of Electronic and Information Engineering](http://eie.xjtu.edu.cn/), [Xi'an Jiaotong University](http://www.xjtu.edu.cn/) supervised by [Dr. Qinghua Zheng](http://qhzheng.gr.xjtu.edu.cn/). I obtained my master degree and bachelor degreen in software engineering from Xi'an Jiaotong University. My research interest mainly focuses on applying data visualization, visual analytics, and machine learning techniques in addressing real-world clinical challenges.
me.institution: Department of Biomedical Informatics and Data Science, Yale University School of Medicine
